cta.title: List Your Property with
cta.description: Ready to sell your property? Aleaddin's Coast is here to help. We offer photography, videography, marketing, and legal support to attract buyers and get the best price for your property.

section_2.title: Coast Offices
section_2.description: Our local experts will guide you on your journey.

section_3.subtitle: Valuable Real Estate Investments
section_3.description: We manage real estate investments worth $3,000,000 across the office, achieving high success with our expert team in this field.

section_4.description_1: When you find a property you want to invest in, you can submit your proposal to start the negotiation process.
section_4.description_2: You can reserve the property you wish to see online and inspect it live.
section_4.description_3: You can receive all the support needed to obtain residency from our expert legal team.
section_4.description_4: You can receive the support required for citizenship applications and procedures from our expert legal team.
section_4.description_5: In case of legal issues you may encounter during property purchase, you can receive professional support from our expert legal team.
section_4.description_6: We offer transportation services for our special clients to showcase properties.
section_4.description_7: Our clients can receive the support they need by having a personal assistant.
section_4.description_8: Our foreign clients can benefit from our personalized translator service to avoid any difficulties while touring properties.

section_2.title: Let Us Sell Your Property
section_2.description: Using our expertise and extensive marketing network, we help you sell your property at the best price and in the shortest time possible. We meticulously plan every step, enhance your property's value by effectively communicating with potential buyers, and leverage our strong customer network.

section_3.title: High Performance
section_3.description: We manage over $13,000,000 worth of 120+ properties. Additionally, we serve over 100 investors and 1500+ subscribers.

section_4.description_1: We offer private solutions for our buyers to invest in our properties.
section_4.description_2: We will list your property on international platforms, targeting potential buyers from Russia, Arab countries, Germany, etc.
section_4.description_3: A short, engaging video clip of the property will be created to attract potential buyers.
section_4.description_4: We will run targeted social media ads to reach a wider audience and attract potential buyers.
section_4.description_5: We offer transportation services for potential buyers who want to visit and inspect the property.
section_4.description_6: Ensuring Search Engine Optimization for better online visibility.

section_5.title: Wide and Comprehensive Solutions
section_5.description: We offer a range of plans tailored to property needs. Whether it's a small farmhouse or a penthouse, we have a plan that's right for it.
section_5.subtitle: Features
section_5.main_description: Each option offers a suitable plan based on your property's features and requirements.

section_6.title: Let's Get Started!
section_6.description: Submit the details of the property you want to sell by filling out the form. Our expert team will create a marketing plan, reach potential buyers, and conclude the sales process for you.
